content.rendered:
1 Step Further… is a 3-day Business Exhibition for established and aspiring business owners at Regent College London Wembley. The event is organised by The TiC Student Forum.
This is the event for students at Regent College London who:
[ul_list icon=”tick”]

  • Own a business
  • Would like to network with business owners
  • Would like to get ideas and advice about setting up a business

[/ul_list]
Where
Auditorium, Regent College London (Wembley Campus)
When
Monday 8 July 2019, 1-2:30pm
Wednesday 10 July 2019, 1-2:30pm
Friday 12 July 2019, 1-2:30pm
Register now
Learn more about this event
Useful links
What is TiC?
What is the TiC Student forum?
Register to attend 1 Step Further…
